about_the_game: 3 Laps on the amazing Circuit de Catalunya to prove your ability as MotoGP™ rider and live the emotions of this exciting world. Select either Valentino Rossi or Marc Marquez and head to the starting grid to race: the light is green!!!  And there's more to follow in the full game.
detailed_description: 3 Laps on the amazing Circuit de Catalunya to prove your ability as MotoGP™ rider and live the emotions of this exciting world. Select either Valentino Rossi or Marc Marquez and head to the starting grid to race: the light is green!!!  And there's more to follow in the full game.
legal_notice:
MOTOGP™13 © 2013 Published and Developed by Milestone S.r.l. All rights reserved. Copyright © 2013 Dorna Sports S.L. All rights reserved.

Dolby and the double-D symbol are trademarks of Dolby Laboratories.

This product is powered by EMotion FX. (c) Copyright 2001-2013 Mystic Game Development.

Motorbikes included in this game may be different from the actual ones in shape, colour and performance.

This game represents a riding simulation of a highly dangerous professional sport, with trained professional riders. Please, do not try to imitate or reproduce any of the riding movements shown in this game. And remember: when riding a motorbike in real life, always ride it safely.
name: MotoGP 13 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows®XP™ SP2, Windows®Vista™, Windows®7, Windows®8
  • Processor:Intel™ 2.4Ghz or similar
  • Memory:1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:NVIDIA® Geforce 7600, AMD® Radeon™ HD 3870 or higher (it must be able to manage Pixel Shader 3.0) with at least 512MB of display memory.
  • Hard Drive:2 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *:Windows®XP™ SP2, Windows®Vista™, Windows®7 or Windows®8
  • Processor:Intel™ Core 2 Duo / AMD™ Athlon 64 X2 or higher.
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:NVIDIA® GeForce™ 9000 series or higher, AMD® Radeon™ HD4000 series or higher (it must be able to manage Pixel Shader 3.0) with at least 1GB of display memory.
  • Hard Drive:2 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection

short_description: 3 Laps on the amazing Circuit de Catalunya to prove your ability as MotoGP™ rider and live the emotions of this exciting world. Select either Valentino Rossi or Marc Marquez and head to the starting grid to race: the light is green!!! And there's more to follow in the full game.
supported_languages:
English*, German*, French*, Italian*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
